modules.name: winapi-enum
modules.desc: Utilizes the WinAPI to enumerate useful and sensitive information from the target system

modules.name: linux-enum
modules.desc: Utilizes basic techniques and commands to enumerate useful and sensitive information from the target

modules.name: regkey-persistence
modules.desc: Creates a Windows Registry key to enable persistent execution of the agent upon startup of the target

modules.name: systemd-persistence
modules.desc: Creates a SystemD service to enable persistent execution of the agent upon startup of the target

modules.name: log-deletion
modules.desc: Deletes all logs contained within /var/log directory on the target

modules.name: history-deletion
modules.desc: Deletes all .history and .bash_history logs on the target
